Title: ASP.NET menu navigation server control
Description: A lightweight menu navigation server control features dynamic horizontal menu generation, simply easy to customize and use.
HomeWiki:
This is a simple light weight menu navigation server control:

Features includes:
1. Display and hide submenu items horizontally when hover or click the menu(depends on configure);
2. Property to enable slow effect of menu transformation
2. Customizable appearance such as color and width.
3. Items are editable programmatically. For example, display additional menu items for admin users.
4. Support xml setup, site map and declarative setup.

See the demo http://www.startaspnetsite.com/menudemo.aspx
Check my blog http://www.startaspnetsite.com/post/2009/04/26/Open-source-ASPNET-menu-navigator-server-control.aspx


Next release will include supporting asp.net style class and increasing flexibility.
